text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Fun facts: 
- 99% of the population has not been tested 
- The US has, by far, the worst per capita testing rate among developed nations
- Thete is no national testing plan
- Kayleigh is a racist who said coronavirus would never come to the US under Trump. https://t.co/X2VbQlLGui
